message:
Training those on the frontline is crucial in the fight against human trafficking.
“Police saw something at the Dorsett Street home that made them believe that the location could be linked to human trafficking.”

data.description: BURLINGTON, N.C. – One person has been arrested as the Hibachi Buffet restaurant in Burlington is being investigated for human trafficking. Homeland Security Investigations made the arrest in connection to an immigration violation. The person's name has not been released. The person was a foreign ...
data.title: 1 person arrested as Hibachi Buffet restaurant in Burlington investigated for human trafficking
